prompt_text: Check the time. If it's between 6 AM and 9 AM, turn on the Office WLED to 50% with a warm white color and turn off all living room lights. If it's between 5 PM and 8 PM, turn on all living room lights to 80% and set the Office WLED to 100% with a cool white color. If it's after 9 PM, turn on the Office WLED to 20% brightness and turn off all living room lights. Wait 5 seconds after any action.
automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_time_routine'
alias: Office WLED and Living Room Time Routine
description: "Time-based Office WLED and Living Room light routine with 5-second delay after actions"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time_pattern
    minutes: '/1'
conditions: []
action:
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ now().hour >= 6 and now().hour < 9 }}"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 50
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 160
                - 80
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
          - delay: '00:00:05'
      - conditions:
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ now().hour >= 17 and now().hour < 20 }}"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
            data:
              brightness: 204
              rgb_color:
                - 200
                - 220
                - 255
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 100
              rgb_color:
                - 200
                - 220
                - 255
          - delay: '00:00:05'
      - conditions:
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ now().hour >= 21 }}"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 20
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 120
                - 40
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
          - delay: '00:00:05'

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living, office, living_room
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten
